summary: Holed up in a decrepit Athenian mansion, a quartet of handsome pariahs wait for something to happen in their lives. As the state tightens the noose on them, the shotguns have the final say. Is this the sad swan song of the sweet bunch?
cast: Despina Tomazani|Dora Masklavanou|Takis Moshos|Takis Spyridakis|Alkis Panagiotidis|Lenia Polycrati|Konstantinos Tzoumas|Dinos Makris|Andreas Tsafos|Haris Romas|Takis Loukatos|Alkmini Stavrou|Marianna Koutalou|Katerina Sigountou|Fay Tsanetopoulou|Natasa Kapsabeli|Isavella Mavraki|Natasa Asiki|Fotini Kotrotsi|Hristos Zygomalas|Panagiotis Kaldis|Manos Tsilimidis|Giorgos Polyhroniadis|Panos Thanassoulis|Nikos Katomeris|Elias Kostandakopoulos|Nikos Stavropoulos|Giannis Kouriotis|Spyros Bibilas|Kostas Baladimas
director: Director: Nikos Nikolaidis (as Nikos G. Nikolaidis)
title: Sweet Bunch
